mapper.sql: a.ID_REPOSITORY AS repositoryId , a.ID_REPOSITORY_CONNECTION AS repositoryConnectionId , a.REPOSITORY_NAME AS repositoryName , a.IS_DEFAULT AS isDefault , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag , rd.REPOSITORY_CONNECTION_NAME AS repositoryConnectionName , rd.HOST_NAME AS hostName , rd.HOST_NAME AS hostName
LEFT JOIN SYS_REPOSITORY_DATABASE rd ON rd.ID_REPOSITORY_CONNECTION = a.ID_REPOSITORY_CONNECTION
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_REPOSITORY a
where a.REPOSITORY_NAME = #{repositoryName} and a.DEL_FLAG = 0

select
from SYS_REPOSITORY a
where a.ID_REPOSITORY = #{id} and a.DEL_FLAG = 0

select
from SYS_REPOSITORY a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
and a.ID_REPOSITORY = #{repositoryId}
and a.REPOSITORY_NAME like '%${repositoryName}%'
